function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"E-commerce stock outs of essential items like hand sanitizer","Impact":"Customer dissatisfaction, public health risk","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced inventory management systems, working with a larger number of suppliers","Technologies":"Inventory management software, algorithmic recommendation systems","People":"Customers, public","Owner":"E-commerce retailers, technology teams"},{"Description":"Price gouging by unscrupulous sellers during a pandemic","Impact":"Customer dissatisfaction, public outrage, price instability","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time algorithms to identify and punish offenders, establishing and enforcing price control mechanisms","Technologies":"Real-time algorithmic monitoring, price control mechanisms","People":"Customers, public","Owner":"E-commerce retailers, technology teams"},{"Description":"Highly variable nature of online customer demand","Impact":"Stock-out challenges, customer dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Proactive inventory management, predictive demand analysis, working with multiple suppliers","Technologies":"Demand prediction algorithms, proactive inventory management systems","People":"Customers, public","Owner":"E-commerce retailers, technology teams"}]}
